00024 template <class T> inline T _min(T x, T y) { return(x < y) ? x : y; }
00025 template <class T> inline T _max(T x, T y) { return(x > y) ? x : y; }

00032 void inline dtoa(double val, char *s) {
00033   std::sprintf(s, "%-16f", val);
00034   char *p = s;
00035   for (; *p != ' '; ++p) {}
00036   *p = '\0';
00037   return;
00038 }
00039 
00040 template <class T>
00041 inline void itoa(T val, char *s) {
00042   char *t;
00043   T mod;
00044 
00045   if (val < 0) {
00046     *s++ = '-';
00047     val = -val;
00048   }
00049   t = s;
00050 
00051   while (val) {
00052     mod = val % 10;
00053     *t++ = static_cast<char>(mod) + '0';
00054     val /= 10;
00055   }
00056 
00057   if (s == t) *t++ = '0';
00058   *t = '\0';
00059   std::reverse(s, t);
00060 
00061   return;
00062 }
00063 
00064 template <class T>
00065 inline void uitoa(T val, char *s) {
00066   char *t;
00067   T mod;
00068   t = s;
00069   while (val) {
00070     mod = val % 10;
00071     *t++ = static_cast<char>(mod) + '0';
00072     val /= 10;
00073   }
00074 
00075   if (s == t) *t++ = '0';
00076   *t = '\0';
00077   std::reverse(s, t);
00078   return;
00079 }

00081 inline const char *read_ptr(const char **ptr, size_t size) {
00082   const char *r = *ptr;
00083   *ptr += size;
00084   return r;
00085 }
00086 
00087 template <class T>
00088 inline void read_static(const char **ptr, T& value) {
00089   const char *r = read_ptr(ptr, sizeof(T));
00090   memcpy(&value, r, sizeof(T));
00091 }

00112 template <class Iterator>
00113 inline size_t tokenizeCSV(char *str,
00114                           Iterator out, size_t max) {
00115   char *eos = str + std::strlen(str);
00116   char *start = 0;
00117   char *end = 0;
00118   size_t n = 0;
00119 
00120   for (; str < eos; ++str) {
00121     // skip white spaces
00122     while (*str == ' ' || *str == '\t') ++str;
00123     bool inquote = false;
00124     if (*str == '"') {
00125       start = ++str;
00126       end = start;
00127       for (; str < eos; ++str) {
00128         if (*str == '"') {
00129           str++;
00130           if (*str != '"')
00131             break;
00132         }
00133         *end++ = *str;
00134       }
00135       inquote = true;
00136       str = std::find(str, eos, ',');
00137     } else {
00138       start = str;
00139       str = std::find(str, eos, ',');
00140       end = str;
00141     }
00142     if (max-- > 1) *end = '\0';
00143     *out++ = start;
00144     ++n;
00145     if (max == 0) break;
00146   }
00147 
00148   return n;
00149 }
00150 
00151 template <class Iterator>
00152 inline size_t tokenize(char *str, const char *del,
00153                        Iterator out, size_t max) {
00154   char *stre = str + std::strlen(str);
00155   const char *dele = del + std::strlen(del);
00156   size_t size = 0;
00157 
00158   while (size < max) {
00159     char *n = std::find_first_of(str, stre, del, dele);
00160     *n = '\0';
00161     *out++ = str;
00162     ++size;
00163     if (n == stre) break;
00164     str = n + 1;
00165   }
00166 
00167   return size;
00168 }
00169 
00170 // continus run of space is regarded as one space
00171 template <class Iterator>
00172 inline size_t tokenize2(char *str, const char *del,
00173                         Iterator out, size_t max) {
00174   char *stre = str + std::strlen(str);
00175   const char *dele = del + std::strlen(del);
00176   size_t size = 0;
00177 
00178   while (size < max) {
00179     char *n = std::find_first_of(str, stre, del, dele);
00180     *n = '\0';
00181     if (*str != '\0') {
00182       *out++ = str;
00183       ++size;
00184     }
00185     if (n == stre) break;
00186     str = n + 1;
00187   }
00188 
00189   return size;
00190 }

00192 inline double logsumexp(double x, double y, bool flg) {
00193 #define MINUS_LOG_EPSILON  50
00194 
00195   if (flg) return y;  // init mode
00196   double vmin = _min(x, y);
00197   double vmax = _max(x, y);
00198   if (vmax > vmin + MINUS_LOG_EPSILON) {
00199     return vmax;
00200   } else {
00201     return vmax + std::log(std::exp(vmin - vmax) + 1.0);
00202   }
00203 }
00204 
00205 inline char getEscapedChar(const char p) {
00206   switch (p) {
00207     case '0':  return '\0';
00208     case 'a':  return '\a';
00209     case 'b':  return '\b';
00210     case 't':  return '\t';
00211     case 'n':  return '\n';
00212     case 'v':  return '\v';
00213     case 'f':  return '\f';
00214     case 'r':  return '\r';
00215     case 's':  return ' ';
00216     case '\\': return '\\';
00217     default: break;
00218   }
00219 
00220   return '\0';  // never be here
00221 }
00222 }
